name: boochat-tw
description: An Electron application with React and TypeScript
author: devrogerinho.com

scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:node && npm run typecheck:web
scripts.build:win: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --win
scripts.build:mac: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --mac
scripts.build:linux: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --linux
scripts.build:all: npm run build:win && npm run build:mac && npm run build:linux
scripts.publish:win: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --win --publish=always
scripts.publish:mac: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --mac --publish=always
scripts.publish:linux: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --linux --publish=always
scripts.publish:all: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-builder --win --mac --linux --publish=always
